entry.title: dotnet/runtime - Issues & Pull Requests - 2023-11-07
entry.content:
Issues

Created

  • NET 6.0 - mutual TLS with private key stored in TPM2 (as a client certificate) #94493
  • [7.0] Assertion failed in System.Net.Http.Json.Functional.Tests in ThreadPoolBoundHandle.BindHandleCore in ThreadPoolBoundHandle.Windows.cs:line 14 #94491
    7.0.x
  • [mono][System.Reflection.Emit] VTable initialization failure for class implementing an interface #94490
    8.0.x
  • [mono][reflection] ArgumentNullException calling `GetCustomAttributes` on user-defined subtype of `ParameterInfo` #94488
    8.0.x
  • [browser][MT] CancellationTokenTests.DerivedCancellationTokenSource #94486
    9.0.0
  • Make it easy to determine entry assembly path when debugging CoreCLR #94474
    9.0.0
  • [browser][HybridGlobalization][tracking] Regressions of text APIs when running in *HybridGlobalization* mode. #94473
  • Usability Issues in HttpClient #94471
  • [net8.0-ios] App crashes on ios device when calling static abstract generic interface method in a sealed class #94467
    9.0.0
  • `ZipFile.ExtractToDirectory` causes faulty permissions with pinned files #94465
  • Improving Arm64 Performance in .NET 9.0 #94464
  • ILLink: ArgumentException in Cecil metadata reader during marking #94457
  • `ZipArchive` in `Update` mode loads whole ZIP file into memory #94455
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 2 Regressions on 11/4/2023 4:52:33 AM #94476
  • [Perf] Linux/x64: 3 Regressions on 11/2/2023 12:57:39 AM #94475
  • Regressions in System.Perf_Convert #94477
  • Regressions in System.Threading.Tasks.Tests.Perf_AsyncMethods #94479
  • Fold handle + offset into a single instruction if possible #94448
    Future
  • [API Proposal]: LoongArch64: add Intrinsics' API for LoongArch64 #94445

Closed

  • Add publish option for NativeAOT to produce .lib file for shared libs #94480
  • Exception occurs while deserializing a System.RunTimeType Property #80590
    Future
  • [browser] Rollup removes `webpackIgnore` comments in release builds #92888
    9.0.0
  • Trying to save application settings crashes the application. #93671
    Future
  • HttpClient - error An existing connection was forcibly closed by the remote host #93276
    9.0.0
  • ILLink: Null ref in type reference walker during marking #94458
  • DEREF_OF_NULL in /src/coreclr/jit/lsrabuild.cpp #93048
    9.0.0
  • Custom converters for enum dictionary keys not working as expected #94452
  • [API Proposal]: new constructor ReadOnlySequence(IEnumerable<ReadOnlyMemory<T>>) #94341
  • [WASM] DotnetHostBuilder withDebugging does not accept a value of 0 #94238
    9.0.0
  • [wasi] Can't import native functions with 64bit parameters when using mono_add_internal_call #90786
    9.0.0
  • Use of `ref readonly` instead of `in` in libraries is a breaking change for F# callers #94317
  • Assertion failed 'm_store->TypeGet() == m_src->TypeGet()' during 'Stress gtSplitTree' #93876
    9.0.0
  • [Experiment] Modernization of Locks #78202
    Future
  • why not preinstall .net runtime in windows10+ #94447
  • Blazor WASM NET 6.0 app fail to build with NET8 RC2 SDK under Framework #94379
    8.0.x
  • Regressions in System.Net.Primitives.Tests.IPAddressPerformanceTests #94300

PullRequests

Created

  • JIT: stop computing dom start nodes for morph RPO #94497
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Fix typos in XML comments on XxHash128 #94495
    area-System.IO
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/6.0' => 'release/6.0-staging' #94494
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [automated] Merge branch 'release/7.0' => 'release/7.0-staging' #94492
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • ElapsedEventArgs: public constructor + sealed #94489
    area-System.ComponentModel, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • update Alpine test images #94487
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • Report StackOverflowException on NativeAOT on Linux #94485
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Update branding to 8.0.1 #94484
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [release/6.0-staging] [mono] [imt] Don't increment vt_slot for non-virtual generic methods #94478
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 6.0.x
  • Introduce VectorXXX.CountMatches and VectorXXX.IndexOfMatch helper methods to ensure optimal codegen for ARM64 and unrolled fallback paths #94472
    area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, community-contribution
  • Update Marshal.QueryInterface() argument modifier (take 2) #94470
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] [imt] Don't increment vt_slot for non-virtual generic methods #94469
    Servicing-approved, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.2
  • [release/7.0-staging] [mono] [imt] Don't increment vt_slot for non-virtual generic methods #94468
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 7.0.16
  • [browser][MT] more testing and cleanup #94466
    arch-wasm, area-VM-threading-mono, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0-staging] Use live M.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces dependency #94459
    Servicing-consider, area-System.DateTime, 8.0.x
  • [RISC-V] Implement SOS related Debugger API code. #94454
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • Fix Comvariant Failure on s390x #94453
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution
  • Disallow inlining Main #94449
    area-NativeAOT-coreclr
  • Move ManagedToNativeGenerator out-of-process #94446
    area-Build-mono
  • Merge remaining JIT tests #94444
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr

Merged

  • Improve scalability of monitored Counter / UpDownCounter #91566
    area-System.Diagnostics.Metric
  • Update branding to 6.0.26 #94482
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Update branding to 7.0.15 #94483
    Servicing-approved, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [browser] keep webpackIgnore #94460
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Do not release frozen segment if we failed extending it #94450
    area-VM-coreclr
  • Add option for R2R configured runs. #94412
    area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • Use live M.Bcl.AsyncInterfaces dependency #94451
    area-System.DateTime, 9.0.0
  • Add file handle limit setting for Alpine #94439
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
  • JIT: Remove dead GT_NOP code in LSRA #94409
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Use fully qualified names when referencing user types. (#94267) #94307
    Servicing-approved, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.x
  • [browser] allow zero as debug level #94456
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [wasm] WasmAppHost: Fix passing message as paramName #94389
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono, community-contribution, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Fix HEAP* deprecation messages #94442
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, community-contribution
  • [browser][MT] fix stale memory on suspended thread #94299
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Fix `EvalHWIntrinsicFunBinary` for ARM `MultiplyByScalar` #94413
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [ILLink analyzer] Add branch analysis #94123
    area-Tools-ILLink

Updated

  • Avoid generating code for unsupported types in config source gen #94438
    area-Extensions-Configuration, source-generator, 9.0.0
  • Add new Pipeline for Running Libs Tests with TestReadyToRun #91229
    area-Infrastructure-libraries, 9.0.0
  • JIT: Remove BBJ_NONE #94239
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/8.0-staging] Socket Tests Disable #94243
    Servicing-consider, area-System.Net.Sockets, test-bug, 8.0.x
  • LSRA: Honor the register aversion decision during allocation #92709
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [RISC-V] Add more gcdump and gcinfo code. #94219
    area-Diagnostics-coreclr, community-contribution, arch-riscv
  • [API Proposal]: Create array from array type #88620
    area-System.Runtime, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • Merge return true/false blocks #94387
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [Mono] Enable IL strip for WASM apps by default #90436
    area-Build-mono
  • Enable aligned_alloc on macOS #94298
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, os-mac-os-x, os-ios
  • Fix potential 'Floating Point Exception' with speculative execution #93517
    area-GC-coreclr, community-contribution
  • [mono] [imt] Don't increment vt_slot for non-virtual generic methods #94437
    area-Codegen-meta-mono
  • Add Capacity property and overloaded TrimExcess #85877
    area-System.Collections, new-api-needs-documentation, no-recent-activity, community-contribution, needs-author-action, 9.0.0
  • Add XUnitLogChecker to log libraries dumps #93906
    NO-MERGE, area-Infrastructure-libraries
  • [wasm] Fix regressed file sizes for blazor #92664
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Arm64: SVE/SVE2 encodings #94285
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [release/7.0] Correctly set sendTrustList flag when saving credentials to cache #94401
    Servicing-approved, area-System.Net.Security, 7.0.x
  • Arm64: Update certain encodings of instructions to make them size agnostic #94104
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [browser][MT] sidecar testing #92226
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • [browser][MT] deputy testing #93920
    arch-wasm, area-System.Runtime.InteropServices.JavaScript, os-browser, 9.0.0
  • Proposal to add WasmImportAttribute to control wasm module names #93823
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices, community-contribution, 9.0.0
  • [release/8.0] Correctly set sendTrustList flag when saving credentials to cache #94402
    area-System.Net.Security, 8.0.x
  • [release/8.0-staging] [mono] Fix deadlock in static constructor initialization #93943
    Servicing-consider, area-VM-meta-mono, 8.0.x
  • JIT: cross-block local assertion prop in morph #94363
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • Use correct native type in test marshallers #93432
    area-System.Runtime.InteropServices
  • Add `repeatCount` in superpmi.exe to repeat the compilation of 1 or more methods #93417
    area-CodeGen-coreclr
  • [iOS][non-icu] HybridGlobalization use system ICU #93220
    area-System.Globalization, os-ios
  • [release/8.0-staging] Fix literal formatting in source generators #94070
    Servicing-consider, area-Extensions-Configuration, 8.0.1
  • Console.Unix: for echoing, write back to the terminal instead of writing to Console.Out. #94414
    area-System.Console, community-contribution
  • Fix GetIndexOfFirstNonAsciiByte_Vector not taken on ARM64 #90527
    area-System.Text.Encoding, community-contribution
  • [browser][AOT] Space in path to published project on unix #94306
    arch-wasm, area-Build-mono
  • Unify parsing part of BigInteger with CoreLib #85978
    area-System.Numerics, community-contribution, needs-author-action
  • Implement MVP part of const generics for CoreCLR #89636
    NO-MERGE, area-VM-coreclr, community-contribution
  • Add document listing supported feature checks #94440
    linkable-framework, area-Tools-ILLink
  • Add printing full type name of nested types for ilverify output #94441
    area-Tools-ILVerification, community-contribution
  • Make Deflate/GZip/ZlibStream empty writes have the same impact as no writes #94433
    area-System.IO.Compression
  • Expose ChannelReader.ReadAllAsync from non-core builds as well #94417
    area-System.Threading.Channels
  • Make ValueTuple members that can be made readonly readonly #90773
    area-System.Runtime, community-contribution
  • Provide System.IO.Pipelines package readme #94372
    area-System.IO.Pipelines, community-contribution
  • [LoongArch64] add Intrinsics' API for LoongArch64. #94400
    NO-MERGE, area-System.Runtime.Intrinsics, new-api-needs-documentation, community-contribution
  • Change several more arrays to be assembly data spans (w/ collection expressions) #93535
    area-System.Runtime
  • Update test build group boundaries to today test distribution #93575
    area-Infrastructure-coreclr
